name: Cyborg Scrooge
description: This is a piece I created in homage to the cryptocurrency coin rush. Scrooge has been known as the richest duck in the world, an achievement he credits to having been "smarter than the smarties, tougher than the toughies, and making it square." He is not only a symbol of his frugality, but also his resilience and industriousness. His legacy will forever live on the Tezos blockchain as I've modernized Scrooge for the 21st century by reillustrating and transforming him into a computerized cyborg version ready to grow his wealth by staking Tezos. He proudly displays his Tezo in his hand, because he believes in the future of blockchain. The blockchain represented by the Matrix style coded math problems behind him.  Illustration drawn in Procreate App and Animation created in After Effects. Created By Graphic Artist Metaphorsy.
